errors: Kupatula kuchitika: Chericerror - onetsetsani kuti minda yonse imadzaza ndi kukhala ndi zolemba za manambala

Kupatula kuchitika: Kuchulukitsa - Chonde muchepetse mtengo wa manambala omwe adalowetsa
